entry.def: Exhibitionism is behaviour that tries to get people's attention all the time, and especially behaviour that most people think is silly.

example.ex: There is an element of exhibitionism in the parents' performance too.

means.word_mean: 1. extravagant and conspicuous behavior intended to attract attention to yourself
2. the perverse act of exposing and attracting attention to your own genitals
